A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Awful movie.....terrible....so sad...I waited in line for the opening day in Imax. The set pieces were cool but what a train wreck. No real direction....piles and piles of plot holes....like why didn't the rebels light speed one of the other ships running out of fuel through smokes battleship....it was a dumpster fire. Rain Johnson screwed the pooch on this one
